title: GNOME 45 Beta Released, Here’s What’s New
description:
The upcoming GNOME 45 desktop environment is now available for public beta testing with more new features, improvements, and bug fixes.

title: KDE Frameworks 5.109 Improves Detection of GPUs on Dual-GPU Systems
description:
KDE Frameworks 5.109 open-source software suite is now available with better detection of GPUs on dual-GPU systems, improved copying of files, and other changes.

The post KDE Frameworks 5.109 Improves Detection of GPUs on Dual-GPU Systems appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: GNOME 44.4 Is Out to Improve Epiphany, GNOME Software, and More
description:
GNOME 44.4 desktop environment is now available with various bug fixes and improvements for Epiphany, GNOME Software, and other apps.
